attributes.action: Lego Universe Online must not close
attributes.additional_details:
Lego.com should reconsider its decision to close, on 31 January 2012, Lego Universe Online Multiplayer (www.legouniverse.com).

It is a very popular game, and its closure will make a lot of children sad.  It allows young people to join forces in fighting baddies, and defeating evil.

Help keep Lego Universe Online open, please.
